abstract: Yahoo C.E.O. Carol Bartz received a $47.2 million compensation package during her first year on the job as the Internet company tried to motivate her to engineer a turnaround, The Associated Press reported.
snippet: Yahoo C.E.O. Carol Bartz received a $47.2 million compensation package during her first year on the job as the Internet company tried to motivate her to engineer a turnaround, The Associated Press reported.
lead_paragraph: Yahoo C.E.O. Carol Bartz received a $47.2 million compensation package during her first year on the job as the Internet company tried to motivate her to engineer a turnaround.

headline.main: Yahoo C.E.O. Gets $47.2 Million for 1st Year

abstract: For a promotion, Microsoft is going to dress dog walkers in T-shirts bearing the name of its new search engine, Bing.
snippet: For a promotion, Microsoft is going to dress dog walkers in T-shirts bearing the name of its new search engine, Bing.
lead_paragraph: It sometimes seems as if advertising is everywhere. And often that is because it is finding its way into and onto just about every surface of unmarked space.

headline.main: Advertising Is Unleashed In Another Venue
